item.title: Good Commit Messages
item.description: Personally I like to look at the commit history of different projects. Often I find that the commit messages provide only little information about the actual changes in the code. Good commit messages help in the review process, when creating changelogs, to be capable of tracking the changes to the source code made by other software developers. This means that good commit messages show whether you are a team player or not.

item.title: About me
item.description: I am a software engineer from Velbert (Germany). I have been enthusiastic about software development for a long time. Starting with the creation of simple pages with HTML and CSS – PHP is now my programming language of choice. I am working at CARL von CHIARI in Düsseldorf. I create web applications using PHP, Symfony and TYPO3. In my spare time I am finishing my Master in IT Management at the FOM University in Düsseldorf.
